quest.name: Rip-off Reunion
journal: Tamachag wants to investigate some unsavory dealings.
objectives: Visit the stalls marked on your map.

dialogue.name: TAMACHAG
dialogue.text: Would you mind helping me with an investigation?

dialogue.name: TAMACHAG
dialogue.text: Those who do business here are allowed to set their own prices. However, I have heard word of a trader that has been abusing this system by charging more for their goods exclusively for foreign customers.

dialogue.name: TAMACHAG
dialogue.text: Should this continue, Reunion's reputation shall suffer great damage. I have taken it upon myself to regularly check the traders' stalls, but I suspect the culprit is hiding their extortionate prices from me.

dialogue.name: TAMACHAG
dialogue.text: That is why I require your help. Please investigate the local traders, taking note of their wares and the prices they sell them for.

dialogue.name: TAMACHAG
dialogue.text: I have marked the five stalls I would like you to visit on your map. Report back to me when you are done.

dialogue.name: TAMACHAG
dialogue.text: I have marked the five stalls I would like you to visit on your map. Report back to me when you are done.

dialogue.name: BAIDUR
dialogue.text: Struggling to find something? Search no longer for I am sure to have it in stock!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Baidur's stall contains a mix of meat, fish, and assorted trinkets. All of his wares are being sold for cheap prices.

dialogue.name: MASGUD
dialogue.text: Come and get your hands on the juiciest fruit and vegetables available in Reunion!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Masgud's stall contains fruit and vegetables. All of his wares are being sold for expensive prices.

dialogue.name: YESUI
dialogue.text: You there, traveler! Can I interest you in some smoked meat? My prices may be steep, but satisfaction is guaranteed.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Yesui's stall contains raw meat, sausages, and smoked food. All of her wares are being sold for expensive prices.

dialogue.name: BOTOKHUI
dialogue.text: Why, that exotic aura you emit... You must be a traveler from far-off lands! Can I interest you in some kumis? It is the most luxurious local drink I have on offer.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Botokhui's stall contains an assortment of alcoholic beverages. All of her wares are being sold for very expensive prices.

dialogue.name: CHAMBUI
dialogue.text: How many buuz do you fancy, misssir?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Chambui's stall contains various kinds of buuz. All of her wares are being sold for fair prices.

dialogue.name: BAIDUR
dialogue.text: Struggling to find something? Search no longer for I am sure to have it in stock!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Baidur's stall contains a mix of meat, fish, and assorted trinkets. All of his wares are being sold for cheap prices.

dialogue.name: MASGUD
dialogue.text: Come and get your hands on the juiciest fruit and vegetables available in Reunion!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Masgud's stall contains fruit and vegetables. All of his wares are being sold for expensive prices.

dialogue.name: YESUI
dialogue.text: You there, traveler! Can I interest you in some smoked meat? My prices may be steep, but satisfaction is guaranteed.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Yesui's stall contains raw meat, sausages, and smoked food. All of her wares are being sold for expensive prices.

dialogue.name: BOTOKHUI
dialogue.text: Why, that exotic aura you emit... You must be a traveler from far-off lands! Can I interest you in some kumis? It is the most luxurious local drink I have on offer.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Botokhui's stall contains an assortment of alcoholic beverages. All of her wares are being sold for very expensive prices.

dialogue.name: CHAMBUI
dialogue.text: How many buuz do you fancy, misssir?

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Chambui's stall contains various kinds of buuz. All of her wares are being sold for fair prices.

dialogue.name: TAMACHAG
dialogue.text: Finished? Well, what did you learn?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: A mix of meat, fish, and other trinkets.

dialogue.name: A3
dialogue.text: A mix of meat, fish, and other trinkets.

dialogue.name: TAMACHAG
dialogue.text: Understood. Tell me about Yesui's stall.

dialogue.name: A5
dialogue.text: A mix of meat, fish, and other trinkets.

dialogue.name: A7
dialogue.text: A mix of meat, fish and other trinkets.

dialogue.name: A9
dialogue.text: A mix of meat, fish and other trinkets.

dialogue.name: TAMACHAG
dialogue.text: That more or less matches up with what I had learned myself. Well, if you exclude Botokhui.

dialogue.name: TAMACHAG
dialogue.text: Kumis is hardly a luxury commodity in these parts. No doubt she was hoping a traveler such as yourself would be ignorant of the fact.

dialogue.name: TAMACHAG
dialogue.text: She cannot be allowed to continue this kind of behavior. I will give her a stern warning later.

dialogue.name: TAMACHAG
dialogue.text: Thank you for your help. The Qestir had entrusted me with a reward that I was to give to anyone able to aid me in uncovering the crafty trader. I would say you have done more than enough to be worthy of it!

dialogue.name: TAMACHAG
dialogue.text: Are you quite sure about that? You did not seem to be confident in your answers. By all means, go and check the stalls once more if your memory is hazy.
